title: Private Tour to the Astonished Nazca Lines and Huacachina Oasis
description: Discover the Nazca Lines and Ica effortlessly and efficiently on a private day tour from Lima. All-inclusive transportation and a carefully curated itinerary ensure an enriching experience without dealing with the complexities of travel planning. After a comfortable transfer to Huacachina Oasis, enjoy sandboarding and a dune buggy ride. Next, take a flight from Ica to the enigmatic Nazca Lines. Cap off the adventure with lunch and tastings at a local vineyard.
all_descriptions: Discover the Nazca Lines and Ica effortlessly and efficiently on a private day tour from Lima. All-inclusive transportation and a carefully curated itinerary ensure an enriching experience without dealing with the complexities of travel planning. After a comfortable transfer to Huacachina Oasis, enjoy sandboarding and a dune buggy ride. Next, take a flight from Ica to the enigmatic Nazca Lines. Cap off the adventure with lunch and tastings at a local vineyard.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Nasca Lines, Nazca PeruAfter picking you up, we will go to Paracas city to flight around the famous and enigmatic Nazca Lines. They are a group of very large geoglyphs hand formed/scratched out to make very strong depressions or shallow dirt removals in the dark soil of the Nazca Desert to reveal the very white under layer of rock or clay. These were carved out sometime between 200 AD and possibly 600 AD. There is no written record of the exact dates, but these seem to be a possible time frame. There is no a definitive reason for the carvings; however, numerous theories have been advanced: sculptures to be seen from the surrounding mountains, a big work project to worship they ancestors, or possibly a kind of message for their god so as to have water since the area is dry and it almost does not rain. You will watch the most representative figures such as the hummingbird, spider, monkey, geometrical forms and other mysterious forms.Duration: 2 hoursStop At:Pisco Nietto, Bodega Fundo Tres Esquinas, s/n, Ica PeruTasting of wines and piscos + Lunch
This is one of the oldest vineyard of this region which produce different types of pisco and wine where we are going to have the opportunity of having a special pisco and wine tastingDuration: 3 hoursStop At:Huacachina, Huacachina, Ica RegionAfter, we will go to Huacachina to see its beautiful oasis which is the perfect destination for those travelers looking to relax surrounded by nature and beautiful landscapes. We will enjoy our day in the sand dunes desert, doing the Buggy tour (the drive is incredible) and practicing sandboarding. So much fun!Duration: 2 hoursStop At:Lima, Lima, Lima RegionAfter picking you up it is going to take 3 hours approximately to get to Ica where we are going to do all the activities, and for being back to Lima to drop you off in your hotel is going to be around 4 hours appoximately.Duration: 7 hours

New Delhi, India184 contributions

Fun and fascinating!

Sep 2025 • Family
This was a real fun and fascinating day for us. Chasky Expeditions provide a wonderful experience, and our guide, Ronald and driver, Philipe were amazing.
We were picked up early from our hotel and we drove to Pisco for our flight over the Nazca lines. En route we stopped at a most lovely place for breakfast. The flight was an experience! After this we stopped for lunch, a winery tour and then on to the Huacachina Oasis and sand dunes - the most fun part of the day. Sand dune bashing in a buggy and sandboarding were amazing experiences.
Ronald was so engaged, attentive and considerate, making this truly one for the best memories!
Written September 22, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
CHASKY XPEDITION
Dear,

reviews.title: Fun and fascinating!
reviews.text: This was a real fun and fascinating day for us. Chasky Expeditions provide a wonderful experience, and our guide, Ronald and driver, Philipe were amazing.We were picked up early from our hotel and we drove to Pisco for our flight over the Nazca lines. En route we stopped at a most lovely place for breakfast. The flight was an experience! After this we stopped for lunch, a winery tour and then on to the Huacachina Oasis and sand dunes - the most fun part of the day. Sand dune bashing in a buggy and sandboarding were amazing experiences.Ronald was so engaged, attentive and considerate, making this truly one for the best memories!

reviews.title: Best way to do Ica and the Nazca Lines
reviews.text: We were picked up in a comfortable SUV by our guide Ronald and driver Phillip for the trip to Ica. Ronald was passionate in his knowledge and Phillip passionate in his driving - just what you want in a long trip!  All stops were amazing - loved the dune buggy, sandboarding, winery as lunch and the flight over the Nazca lines. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: What and incredible tour!
reviews.text: My family and I took the “Private Tour to the Astonishing Nazca Lines and Huacachina Oasis” with Chasky Xpedition, and we had such an incredible time!Our tour guide, Felipe, was amazing! He was extremely knowledgeable, friendly, and genuinely invested in making sure we had the best possible experience. On top of that, he spoke perfect English, which made everything smooth.We were even able to customize the tour to our interests — instead of visiting Pisco Nietto, we opted for the Paracas National Reserve, which was absolutely worth it. The Huacachina oasis and the dunes in the desert were so much fun. And, of course, the Nazca Lines were AMAZING, a true once-in-a-lifetime sight! This tour was especially convenient because the flight departs from Ica airport, allowing us to skip an unnecessarily extra-long car drive.Thank you so much Felipe!

reviews.title: Very interesting experience
reviews.text: The trip was very interesting and the guide Ronald very friendly and always attentive to everything we neededSpectacular views and very fun dunes

reviews.title: Ronald excellent guide
reviews.text: The guide Ronald was extraordinary, very cultured with excellent attitude and kept giving explanations, you can see that he enjoys his work

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: The tour was increíble, it was an beautiful experience in Perú. Felipe and Wilton were great. We took so many pictures.  Thanks!

reviews.title: Great day out
reviews.text: We had a great day with our guide Ronald and driver Wilton. The Van was modern, clean and comfortable, and narration through the journey really useful. The flight, winery tour, buggy ride etc were all perfectly coordinated and seamless. Would do it again in a heartbeat (and Ronald knows a little bit about Aussie sports now too!). Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Charming and unforgettable
reviews.text: Excellent tour! Except it's not cheap, but it's worth it. We were picked up on time at the hotel and we followed silver the first destination, which was the Oasis. The journey is long, but the car was very comfortable and passed up that fast. Although not the biggest attraction of the tour, the Oasis is quite cool and the sandboard and buggy ride are fun. We have lunch at the vineyard and we continue to the flight over the lines of Nasca which are charming.  We loved the walk. Special thanks to Guia Ronald and driver Carlos.

reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
reviews.text: My husband and I highly recommend the private tour to the Nazca lines and Huacachina Oasis with Chasky Xpedition. The team that provided the tour, Felipe, and our driver were exceptional. We were picked up on time and taken from our hotel to the Pisco airport, a several-hour drive in a comfortable SUV. Our driver ensured a very smooth and safe drive. During the drive, Felipe provided helpful background information on the Nazca lines. He is very knowledgeable and can communicate complex concepts in a friendly and understandable manner.When we arrived at the airport, he took us to the museum and continued explaining what we would see while we waited to receive our seat assignments on the plane.The Nazca Lines plane flight was a once-in-a-lifetime experience! Upon our return, we drove to the Huacachina Oasis. The dune buggy company and driver provided exceptional service, making our dune buggy ride thrilling and memorable. We ate a delicious lunch. We also did a private tasting at the beautiful Tabernero winery, and Felipe ensured we tasted high-end sipping piscos. We had an excellent drive back to our hotel.We highly recommend the tour. It’s more expensive than others because you spend less time (hours) on the road, and the plane flight is more expensive since it’s from a closer airport to Lima. However, it was well worth it! It is a first-class tour.

reviews.title: Maybe go with a more established tour operator
reviews.text: Tour company cancelled because they claimed "safety reasons" of the aircraft, but we all know it was because not enough people signed up for the tour.  They provided a full refund, but it was a pain in the neck to meet up with them because they wanted to give me cash back instead of refunding to credit card.
